IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText:
Reporting: CAR B-5 // TFC CARR // Body worn Camera not available // In-Car Camera not available

23-MSP-016906

Complainant:
Mario MANALDI (VCC Staff)
Richard D KUNKEL Jr. (VCC Staff)
Ms. A. MOREFIELD (VCC Staff)

Involved Person(s):
Shanna Nicole DUVALL (VCC Student)
Kimora CRAPPER (VCC Student)

Possible Witness(es):
Brianna WHITE (VCC Student)
Haleigh Marie TACKETT (VCC Student)
Trania Jackson DYNASTY (VCC Student)
Amoni HICKMAN (VCC Student)


    On 5/12/23 at approximately 1300 hours I, Tfc. Carr #6935, spoke to Mario MANALDI, the assistant Superintendent at the Victor Cullen Center (VCC) in the education wing of VCC. MANALDI advised the previous evening at about 2015 hours one of the female students had alleged an assault/unwanted touching had been reported by Shanna Nicole DUVALL.

(see attached VCC Incident Reporting Form)

    There was no physical contact injury reported in the incident. No medical attention was required for anyone involved. In summary, DUVALL stated on 5/4/23 at approximately 1030 hours she was groped by Kimora CRAPPER in the exercise room. DUVALL stated other students Brianna WHITE, Haleigh TACKETT, Trania DYNASTY and Amoni HICKMAN were touching each other in the same location.

    After speaking with the assistant superintendent I believed the statement made by DUVALL may be a fabrication. MANALDI advised the exercise room where the physical contact was alleged had been secured on 5/3/23 through 5/5/23. MANALDI advised he could provide CCTV footage corroborating the lack of possible access to the exercise room. Additionally according to the VCC report DUVALL claims she called 211 on 5/4/23 after the physical contact. MANALDI confirmed that no 211 Call had been made from VCC phone lines. MANALDI additionally contacted the 211 call center and no contact was made with DUVALL.

I request this case be forwarded to the Criminal Enforcement Division.

All the above events occurred in Frederick County, Maryland.

ATTACHMENTS:

    - Copy of Note from Duvall

NARRATIVE:

    On 5/12/2023 at approximately 1313 hours, I was contacted by D/Sgt. Stein #3033, of the MSP Frederick Barrack, and advised of an incoming sexual assault involving two juveniles at the Victor Cullen Center, 6000 Cullen Dr, Sabillasville, MD 21780.

    At approximately 1315 hours, I made contact with TFC Carr #6935, of the MSP Frederick Barrack, and was provided the information captured in his Original Narrative.

    On 5/15/2023 at approximately 1100 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson #5743 and I responded to the Victor Cullen Center. A short time later, S/Tpr. Burleson and I met with Assistant Superintendent Monaldi. I advised Assistant Superintendent Monaldi that I was following up with TFC Carr's investigation and would like to speak with the complainant/victim, Shanna Nicole Duvall (W/F 03/03/2009), Brianna White (B/F 11/10/2006), Trania Dynasty Jackson (B/F 01/03/2006), Haleigh Marie Tackett (W/F 07/07/2009) and Amoni Hickman (B/F 04/19/2007). Assistant Superintendent Monaldi provided background information regarding Duvall and the suspect, Kimora Crapper (B/F 02/04/2008).  Assistant Superintendent Monaldi added that Crapper was transferred out of Victor Cullen Center on 5/12/2023. Assistant Superintendent Monaldi also advised that Duvall had expressed how she was going to file a Prison Rape Elimination Act (PREA) against Crapper, given Crapper was alleged to be filing a PREA against Duvall. Assistant Superintendent Monaldi also advised that Duvall has filed false allegations against staff and youth in the past. Assistant Superintendent Monaldi further provided that the youth did not have access to the Exercise Room of the Gymnasium on the date of the allegations.

    Assistant Superintendent Monaldi provided an interview room for S/Tpr. Burleson and I to conduct interviews. 

    The forthcoming interviews were recorded on a departmentally issued Sony IC Recorder. The following interviews are not a complete and exact transcription, but mere synopsis. For more clear and concise dissertation of these interviews, refer to the interview recordings attached to the case file.

    At approximately 1131 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson and I interviewed Duvall. Duvall advised on either 5/4/2023 or 4/27/2023 at approximately 1030 hours to 1130 hours, Ms. Goins was monitoring youths, to include Duvall and Crapper. Duvall advised that she was in the Exercise Room, Gymnasium. Duvall advised that while in the Exercise Room, she was on a stationary bike or treadmill. Duvall advised that while she was on the workout equipment, Crapper approached her and said something. Duvall advised that due to music playing, she was unsure what Crapper said, but then Crapper touched Duvall's right breast and left thigh. Duvall advised that she advised Crapper to stop and that Crapper would not stop. Duvall advised that Crapper touched her with her right hand. Duvall advised that the alleged sexual assault occurred for approximately 2 - 3 minutes. Duvall also made allegations that Hickman touched White inappropriately while in the Exercise Room. Duvall also made allegations against Tackett and Jackson. Duvall advised that she and Crapper, were just "existing" when asked about the interactions with one another. Duvall later advised that she, Crapper and Hickman had gotten into a physical altercation with each other on 5/12/2023. Duvall then questioned why she, Crapper and Hickman were placed in the same placement. 

    At approximately 1143 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson and I interviewed Brianna White. During the interview, White denied the allegations made by Duvall. White stated nothing happened. When asked if White knew Crapper, she denied knowing Crapper. When asked if White knew Duvall, she stated she did and that Duvall "snitched". White then stated against nothing happened and that Duvall was making false allegations. When asked if White was aware of the incident in question, White advised she had no information on the matter. When asked I showed White an image of Crapper, White advised that she did not know Crapper. White denied any misconduct against her and could not provide any investigative leads in the case.

     At approximately 1151 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson and I interviewed Trania Dynasty Jackson. During the interview, Jackson denied ever seeing Crapper assault Duvall.

    At approximately 1202 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson and I interviewed Haleigh Marie Tackett. During the interview, Tackett denied ever seeing Crapper assault Duvall. Tackett denied ever seeing any misconduct take place. Tackett advised she did not believe the youth had access to the Excersie Room on 5/4/2023 or 4/27/2023.

    Prior to the interview with Hickman, Victor Cullen Center staff provided me with a note from Duvall, which advised the alleged sexual assault took place on 5/8/2023 between 1030 hours and 1130 hours. 

    At approximately 1209 hours, S/Tpr. Burleson and I interviewed Amoni Hickman. During the interview Hickman advised she knew both Duvall and Crapper. Hickman denied ever observing Crapper assaulting Duvall. Hickman also denied ever observing Crapper touching Duvall in any fashion. When going over the details of the alleged sexual assault, Hickman denied seeing the allegations. Hickman acknowledged that the youth sometimes have access to the Exercise Room in the Gymnasium. Hickman denied having access to the Exercise Room on 4/27/2023 or 5/8/2023. When asked if Hickman had anything further to advise, she advised she did and went on to say that Duvall would write Crapper letter detailing how Duvall wished for Crapper to touch her "sexually". Hickman also provided that Duvall was filing PREA on Crapper, because Crapper intended to file PREA on Duvall. Hickman advised that she has known both Duvall and Crapper through detention. Hickman alleged that Duvall was going to file PREA on her as well. Hickman went on to advise that Duvall expressed to Crapper how she wanted Crapper to be her girlfriend as well as how Duvall wished for Crapper to touch on her. Hickman advised that Crapper told her the previously listed information. Hickman advised she was told the information in the afternoon of 5/12/2023. Hickman went on to state that Duvall will walk around the unit with her pants down, exposing her underwear. Hickman advised that Duvall told Crapper that she was "bluffing" and that Duvall stated Crapper wasn't trying to "fuck" while in jail. Hickman advised that Duvall signed a letter to Crapper stating "you going to get some pussy tomorrow". Hickman advised that Crapper told Hickman that Crapper did not like Duvall and that Crapper thought Duvall was ugly and that Crapper thought Duvall looked like a boy. Hickman advised that the only reason that Duvall made the allegations is due to Duvall, Hickman and Crapper getting into a fight. Hickman made allegations that Duvall had assaulted her at a different juvenile detention facility. Hickman went on to advise that Duvall threaded to stab Crapper and Hickman on 5/12/2023. Hickman advised that she has also filed a grievance against Duvall. Hickman also alleged that Duvall entered Crapper's room and kissed Crapper. Hickman advised that Crapper told her about Duvall kissing Crapper. Hickman believed the incident occurred at sometime in May 2023. Hickman added that Duvall makes her feel uncomfortable. 

    After the interviews concluded, S/Tpr. Burleson and I responded to Assistant Superintendent Monaldi's Office. I requested to review video surveillance of the Gymnasium on 5/8/2023 and 4/27/2023 from approximately 1030 hours to 1130 hours, which Assistant Superintendent Monaldi assisted with. During a review of the surveillance on 4/27/2023, youth did not have access to the Exercise Room of the Gymnasium. During a review of the surveillance on 5/8/2023, youth did have access to the Exercise Room of the Gymnasium. Further review provided that youth, including Duvall and Crapper, as well as Ms. Goins can be seen in the Gymnasium. Later in the video, youth, including Duvall and Crapper can be seen gaining access to the Exercise Room, while Ms. Goins supervises. Ms. Goins can be seen sitting on the edge of the Gymnasium bleachers, closest to the Exercise Room, allowing her to observe the youth. While monitoring the youth, Ms. Goins walks to retrieve a log book, which took minor seconds to retrieve, and she continued to monitor the youth in the Exercise Room. Due to the angle of the video surveillance system, I was unable to see directly into the Exercise Room. 

Due to the facts provided above, the case is being CLOSED, Unfounded.

Case Status: CLOSED, Unfounded
